Treasure hunt
1. The aim is to find the treasure at the final clue,or to complete as many of the clues as
possible before the time limit runs out.
2. Maximum 2 participants in a team.
3. Each team must have one Android phone with internet connectivity.
4. The clue has to be found in a particular order,the team cannot skip a clue.Skipping a clue will
lead to the disqualification of the team.
5. Obstructing the opponent teams by any means will lead to disqualification.
6. The team which completes the game first is declared as winner
